p: Analogously to quercetin, kaempferol also proved capable of inducing hyperacetylation of histone H3 complex in human liver and colon cancer cell lines, therefore reducing cell viability and proliferation rate [ 120]. Finally, in silico molecular docking and in vitro profiling have revealed kaempferol as a pan-inhibitor of human HDACs of classes I, II, and IV, meaning that it can also impact cell differentiation and apoptosis [ 120].
